description: Numerators of Taylor series expansion of arcsin(x). Also arises from arccos(x), arccsc(x), arcsec(x), arcsinh(x).
comments: Note that the sequence is not monotonic.
references: Bronstein-Semendjajew, Taschenbuch der Mathematik, 7th German ed. 1965, ch. 4.2.6
L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 88.
H. B. Dwight, Tables of Integrals and Other Mathematical Data, Macmillan, NY, 1968, Chap. 3.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..200
